attributes.action: YOUR SIGNATURE = OUR PEACE (petiton to create a meeting between Iran and the USA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition for the president of Iran (Mr. Mahmoud Ahmadinejad) and the president of the USA (Mr.G.W.Bush) to  invite them to have a face to face talk after 28 years to resolve the matter in the middle east and I need the signatures of you people.
I will be having coverage in the news and papers, and worldwide coverage on the day of the groundbreaking meeting we are attempting to create.
